title: Unnai Kanda Naal Mudhal Lyrics Salim Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Unnai Kanda Naal Mudhal
Singer(s): Supriya Joshi, Hemachandra, Srinivasan
Movie: Salim
Lyrics: Annamalai
Music: Vijay Antony

Unnai kanda naal mudhal
en thookkam ponadhu.
Thoonginaalum un mugam
ennendru sollvadhu.

Unnai kanda naal mudhal
en thookkam ponadhu.
Thoonginaalum un mugam
ennendru sollvadhu.

Enadhu thozhil thazhaiyai saaithu
nerungi nee vazha vendum.
pirindhu neeyum nadakkum podhu
en idhayam kaayam padum.

vizhigal paarthu viragal korthu
madiyil naan thoonga vendum.
Unadhu anbil karaiyumpodhu
udhattil poo pooththidum.

Ulagamey marakkiren
siragillai , parakkiren
mazhai illai nenaigiren
unnil karaigiren.

Unnai kanda naal mudhal
en thookkam ponadhu.
Thoonginaalum un mugam
ennendru sollvadhu.

Siriththu pesum unadhu vaarththai
dhinamum naan ketkavendum.
Uravu endru yevarumillai
en ulagam nee aagidum.

Idhayam thannil araigal naangil
enakku nee mattum vendum
Tharaiyin meley nizhalai pole
innaindhu naam vaazhanum.

Unnai kanda naal mudhal
en thookkam ponadhu.
Thoonginaalum un mugam
ennendru sollvadhu.
